subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Basketball
Prudential Center (Newark)
lead_paragraph: After nearly three decades and 1,173 N.B.A. games, the Nets will move to Newark’s Prudential Center for a two-year pit stop en route to a new home in Brooklyn.
snippet: After nearly three decades and 1,173 N.B.A. games, the Nets will move to Newark’s Prudential Center for a two-year pit stop en route to a new home in Brooklyn.
